page.title: 08WEST HALLAM-------K.PEARCE
page.content: WEST HALLAM HAS QUITE A LOT OF CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES,EG MINORS:MINORS CLUB IS HELD IN THE COMMUNITY CENTRE ON WEDNESDAY EVENING.THERE IS ALSO BROWNIES AND GUIDES,AND CUBS AND SCOUTS GO TO THE SHAND CENTRE IN STANLEY COMMON. IN THE NEW COMMUNITY CENTRE ON MONDAYS AND FRIDAYS,BADMINTON IS HELD;INTERS AND YOUTH CLUB IS ALSO HELD IN THE COMMUNITY CENTRE ON STATION ROAD. IN THE SUMMER THE CARNIVAL TAKES PLACE AND THE DIFFERENT FLOATS TRAVEL DOWN BEECH LANE ONTO ST.WILFREDS ROAD, ALONG HIGH LANE AND BACK TO SCARGILL SCHOOL.THE HISTORY SOCIETY ALSO ORGANISES A WELL DRESSING EXHIBITION WHICH IS DISPLAYED AND DECORATES THE WHOLE VILLAGE.
